text: The Ethiopian Football Federation (; EFF) is the governing body of football in Ethiopia. It is in charge of the men's and the women's national teams. The association was founded in 1943. It became a member of FIFA in 1952 and CAF in 1957. Category:1943 establishments Category:1940s establishments in Africa Category:Football governing bodies in Africa Category:Organizations based in Ethiopia Category:Sport in Ethiopia
title: Ethiopian Football Federation
